content: p1 repeat from * 2 more times p1 k3 p1 round 3 as round 1 rnds 4 - 8 as round 2 round 9 *p1 yo s2kpo yo p2 k3 p1 repeat from * 2 more times p1 yo s2kpo yo p1 rnds 10 - 14 as round 2 foot after the gusset decreases continue following the stitch pattern shown in chart a or written instructions on page 3 on the instep sts and working in stockinette st plain knitting on the sole sts work this way until the foot measures approx 4 cm/1 5 inches less than your desired sock length ending with any round however ending with either round 3 or round 9 of chart a will give you a more finished pattern look proceed to toe shaping toe shaping round 1 decrease round k1 ssk k to 3 sts before mb k2tog k1 smb k1 ssk k to 3 sts before borm k2tog k1 round 2 k all sts repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 30 sts remain remove markers finishing cut yarn leaving a tail of approximately 25 cm 10 inch for grafting the stitches together make sure there are 15 sts on each needle holding the two needles parallel to each other and using kitchener stitch graft the remaining sts together with a tapestry needle weave in all ends soak and block socks © laurelknits oy 2021 4 #yolandasocks chart a © laurelknits oy 2021 5 #yolandasocks
